CustomField.description: The number of days that this advice was in setup. Starts acting like a counter until settling on a final value when the advice moves from a value of setup.
CustomField.formula:
IF(ISBLANK(Setup_Complete_Date__c), (5 * ( FLOOR( ( TODAY() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8)) / 7 )) + MIN( 5, MOD( TODAY() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ))) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)- DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 )) + MIN( 5, MOD( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ))),
(5 * ( FLOOR( ( Setup_Complete_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 )) + MIN( 5, MOD( Setup_Complete_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ))) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 )) + MIN( 5, MOD( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ))) )
CustomField.label: Days in setup
